title: A Father's Fights to Save His 11-Year-Old from Medical Mutilation with Libby Emmons
itunes:title: A Father's Fights to Save His 11-Year-Old from Medical Mutilation with Libby Emmons
description:
Jack Posobiec guesting for Charlie, welcomes Editor-In-Chief of The Post Millennial, Libby Emmons, to break down a shocking story out of New York where a father is fighting to protect his daughter from a "gender transition" process as his ex-wife initiates the transformation. What is gender affirming care even entail for a 11-year-old girl? What can it mean for kids of different age. Libby Emmons walks through this nightmare that is being pushed on kids and families across the nation. In a conversation that isn't appropriate for younger ears, please listen and share this horrifying story that increasingly a reality for more and more families. 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
